item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】PACK - John Mayer - Complete Discography 1999-2021 (DSD - FLAC 24 Bits/16 Bits) (With rare/unreleased stuff)
item.description:
Hello everyone! I'm a huge John Mayer collector, but I also happen to be a collector as well.
I decided to share with all of you his entire discography in the most complete way possible. I'll especify each source of every album and every rare song that I included (If I did so). Hope you enjoy!!!



Inside Wants Out (Deluxe Edition, FLAC 16 bits/44.1 khz, 1999-2001) (Source: Qobuz & rare CD's)
Tracklist:

1.- Back To You (Demo)
2.- No Such Thing (Demo)
3.- My Stupid Mouth (Demo)
4.- Neon (Demo)
5.- Victoria
6.- Love Soon
7.- Comfortable
8.- Neon 12:47 AM (Sourced from the original independant release of the CD. Removed in re-releases)
9.- Quiet
10.- Not Myself (Demo) (Sourced from my copy of the japanese re-release of the album "SICP276 PROMO")




Room For Squares (Original "Aware" release with the original mixes, FLAC 16 bits/44.1Khz, 2001) (Source: My own "Aware" CD)

Tracklist:

1.- No Such Thing
2.- Why Georgia
3.- My Stupid Mouth
4.- Your Body Is A Wonderland
5.- Neon
6.- City Love
7.- 83
8.- Love Song For No One
9.- Back To You
10.- Great Indoors
11.- Not Myself
12.- St. Patrick's Day



Room For Squares ("Columbia Re-Release" Deluxe Edition with the standard mixes, DSD64, 2001) (Source: Hybrid SACD released in 2001)
Note: Bonus tracks marked with "*" are FLAC 16 Bits/44.1 Khz. Source from my japanese RFS cd.

Tracklist:

1.- No Such Thing
2.- Why Georgia
3.- My Stupid Mouth
4.- Your Body Is A Wonderland
5.- Neon
6.- City Love
7.- 83
8.- 3x5
9.- Love Song For No One
10.- Back To You
11.- Great Indoors
12.- Not Myself
13.- St. Patrick's Day
14.- * Lenny
15.- * The Wind Cries Mary



Heavier Things (Deluxe Edition, DSD64 - FLAC 16 Bits/44.1 Khz, 2003) (Source: Hybrid SACD released in 2003. Files marked with "*" are FLAC's sourced from promo CD's)

Tracklist:

Disc 1
1.- Clarity
2.- Bigger Than My Body
3.- Something's Missing
4.- New Deep
5.- Come Back To Bed
6.- Home Life
7.- Split Screen Sadness
8.- Daughters
9.- Only Heart
10.- Wheel
11.- * Kid-A (Sourced from my "Bigger Than My Body AU-Promo CD)
12.- * Tracing (Studio Version) (Sourced from my "Bigger Than My Body AU-Promo CD)



Disc 2: Heavier Things Promo Bonus Disc
1.- * Clarity (
2.- * Neon (
3.- * Come Back To Bed
4.- * Clarity (Single Remix) (Special mix used for the official video)
5.- * Come Back To Bed (Remix) (Sourced from the "Heavier Things Sampler". Rare mix)



Continuum (Deluxe Edition, FLAC 24 Bits/96 Khz-16 Bits/44.1 Khz, 2006) (Source: Qobuz for 24-bits files. 16-bits files are sourced from Qobuz or promo/rare CD's)

Tracklist

Disc 1
1.- Waitin' On The World To Change
2.- I Don't Trust Myself With (Lovin' You)
3.- Belief
4.- Gravity
5.- The Heart Of Life
6.- Vultures
7.- Stop This Train
8.- Slow Dancing In A Burning Room
9.- Bold As Love
10.- Dreaming With A Broken Heart
11.- In Repair
12.- I'm Gonna Find Another You
13.- * Say (Sourced from Qobuz. Originally released as a single but incorporated to the tracklist later on)

Disc 2
1.- Can't Take That Plane (Sourced from Qobuz. Released in a special bundle)
2.- Who Did You Think I Was (Studio Version) (Sourced from WDYTIW promo CD by Sony BMG)
3.- Come When I Call (Studio Version) (Sourced from my "One By One: KZK Soundtrack from Adidas Original By Originals" promo CD)
4.- Good Love Is On The Way (Studio Version) (Sourced from the japanese cd of Continuum)
5.- Stiched Up (Sourced from Qobuz)
6.- I Don't Need No Doctor (Studio Version) (Sourced from Qobuz)
7.- Hummingbird Feat. B.B King (Sourced from "B.B King & Friends: 40" CD)
8.- Route 66 (Short & Extended version) (Sourced from the "Cars OST" CD)



Where The Light Is: Live At The Nokia Theater (With rare bonus track, FLAC 16 Bits/44.1Khz, 2007) (Source: Qobuz and promo CD for the bonus track)

Tracklist:

1.- Neon
2.- Stop this train
3.- In your atmosphere
4.- Daughters
5.- Free Fallin'
6.- Everyday I have the blues
7.- Wait until tomorrow
8.- Who did you think i was
9.- Come When I Call
10.- Good love is on the way
11.- Out Of My Mind
12.- Vultures
13.- Bold as love
14.- Waiting on the world to change
15.- Slow dancin' in a burning room
16.- Why georgia
17.- Thr heart of life
18.- I don't need no doctor
19.- Gravity
20.- I don't trust myself with (loving you)
21.- Belief
22.- I'm Gonna find another you
23.- No Such Thing (Sourced from the promotional japanese CD, rare to find)



Battle Studies (With bonus tracks, FLAC 16 Bits/44.1Khz, 2009) (Source: Qobuz & rare cd's for the bonus tracks)

Tracklist:

1.- Heartbreak warfare
2.- All we ever do is say goodbye
3.- Half of my heart
4.- Who says
5.- Perfectly loneky
6.- Assassin
7.- Crossroads
8.- War of my life
9.- Edge of desire
10.- Do you know me
11.- Friends, lovers or nothing
12.- I'm on fire (Sourced from the japanese CD version of the album)
13.- Half Of My Heart (Pop Mix) (Sourced from the "Half Of My Heart Promo CD-R. Used for the official video)



Born And Raiseed (With bonus tracks, FLAC 24 Bits/44.1Khz - 16 Bits/44.1Khz, 2012) (Source: Qobuz for 24-bits files, bonus tracks marked with "*" are sourced from CD's and Qobuz)

Tracklist:

1.- Queen of California
2.- The age of worry
3.- Shadow days
4.- Speak for Me
5.- Something like Olivia
6.- Born and Raised
7.- If I ever get around to living
8.- Love is a verb
9.- Walt Grace's submarine test, January 1967
10.- Whiskey, Whiskey, Whiskey
11.- A place to call Home
12.- Born and Raised (Reprise)
13.- * Fool to love you (Sourced from my japanese copy of the album. The lossless version of this song was no where to be found. So enjoy!)
14.- * Go Easy On Me (Sourced from Qobuz)



Paradise Valley (Complete Edition, FLAC 24 Bits/96Khz. 2013) (Source: Qobuz)

Tracklist:

1.- Wildfire
2.- Dear Marie
3.- Waitin' On The Day
4.- Paper Doll
5.- Call Me The Breeze
6.- Who You Love
7.- I Will Be Found (Lost At Sea)
8.- Wildfire (Encore)
9.- You're No One 'Till Someone Lets You Down
10.- Badge And Gun
11.- On The Way Home
12.- Lies Feat. Eric Clapton
13.- Don't Wait Feat. Eric Clapton
14.- Magnolia Feat. Eric Clapton
15.- XO



The Search For Everything (FLAC 24 Bits/96Khz, 2017) (Source: Qobuz)

Tracklist:

1.- Still Feel Like Your Man
2.- Emoji Of A Wave
3.- Helpless
4.- Love On The Weekend
5.- In The Blood
6.-Changing
7.- Theme for "The Search Of Everything)
8.- Moving On And Getting Over
9.- Never On The Day You Leave
10.- Rosie
11.- Roll It On Home
12.- You're Gonna Live Forever In Me



Sob Rock (Complete Edition, FLAC 24 Bits/44.1Khz - 96Khz, 2021) (Source: Qobuz. 96khz files are marked with "*")

Tracklist:

1.- Last Train Home
2.- Shouldn't Matter But It Does
3.- New Light
4.-Why You No Love Me
5.- Wild Blue
6.- Shot In The Dark
7.- I Guess I Just Feel Like (Sob Rock Mix)
8.- 'Til The Right One Comes
9.- Carry Me Away (Sob Rock Mix)
10.- All I Want Is To Be With You
11.- Last Train Home (Ballad Version)
12.- Carry Me Away (Pre-Sob Rock Mix. Original Version. Sourced from Qobuz before it was removed)
13.- I Guess I Just Feel Like (Pre-Sob Rock Mix. 2019 Version. Source from Qobuz before it was removed)

Hope y'all enjoy! I compilated all of this with so much love.
